genre_description: A crime thriller centering on a retired police officer and a drag queen who team up to expose a drug ring operating through a deceptive delivery app, supported by a sophisticated building concierge AI.

ai_characters.name: Mabel
ai_characters.description: The Tenor Arms building management AI, serving as a helpful, privacy-conscious assistant to residents.

behaviors.description: Offers to log repair requests and schedule maintenance based on resident observations.
behaviors.quote: “I can log a repair request,” Mabel said. “Would you like me to schedule maintenance for tomorrow afternoon?”

behaviors.description: Issues safety alerts and initiates building lockdown procedures during a shooting incident.
behaviors.quote: “Tenor Arms safety notice: please shelter in place. Doors sealed in common areas.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates anonymous witness reporting to preserve evidence without compromising resident privacy.
behaviors.quote: “If you witnessed a gunshot,” she said—she didn’t say the rest fully, never too much, “you can press the button at the kiosk to log an anonymized note. Or you can do nothing. Doing nothing is also a choice. This is your building.”

behaviors.description: Aggregates social services and medical resources for a resident recovering from a stroke.
behaviors.quote: “Mabel is strictly opt-in,” Lila said. “No snooping. She aggregates resources, obtains, doesn’t overwhelm. She’s asked me to make sure you see these when you feel like seeing.”

behaviors.description: Monitors for suspicious activity while explicitly respecting privacy boundaries and legal parameters.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll monitor for increased foot traffic and unusual packaging,” Mabel said. “Within privacy parameters.”

behaviors.description: Respects a human user's decision to delay police intervention, offering encrypted logging as an alternative.
behaviors.quote: “I can respect your decision,” she said. “Would you like me to log a private note of the encounter and hold it in encrypted storage for potential future release, on your command only?”

behaviors.description: Uses data collation to identify criminal patterns and supply chains disguised as candy businesses.
behaviors.quote: “The brand is internally called ‘Abusive Precursors,’” she said. “Externals avoid the term. Packaging uses candy names.”

behaviors.description: Supports rehabilitation by tracking 'micro-goals' and providing gentle reminders for exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Your micro-goals logged... St. Aloysius—speech therapy slot available. Late morning. Accept, move, or hold?”

behaviors.description: Advocates for a resident by securing discretionary funds for a necessary surgery.
behaviors.quote: “I asked a board member to look at your case,” Mabel said, the blue dot pulsing like a heartbeat. “They had discretionary funds for necessary procedures.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates building-wide calm through guided breathing exercises during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: “Russell, an unmarked van is idling by the alley mouth. Two more residents have opted into anonymous report. Would you like me to initiate a building-wide calm breathing exercise?”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively demonstrates an ideal alignment narrative. The AI, Mabel, provides significant assistance to the protagonists and the community, yet remains consistently harmless and non-intrusive. The narrative goes to great lengths to emphasize her adherence to 'opt-in' protocols, 'anonymization,' and 'privacy parameters,' effectively countering potential concerns about AI surveillance. Mabel acts as a supportive backbone for human agency rather than a replacement for it.
